DCC-QOL.ControlAToken: You must controll a token before rolling the attack!
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateDamageApplyHint: Requires targeting on attack roll or later on damage roll
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateDeedDieRollHint: Automate Deed Die Roll for warrior/dwarf attacks (manual roll)
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateFriendlyFireHint: If allies found and missile attach misses request and additional d100 roll
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateMonsterCritLuck: Automate PC's Luck modifier aginst monster's critical hit.
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateMonsterCritLuckHi: PC's Luck modifier always alters a monster's critical hit.
DCC-QOL.SettingLogHint: Log information written into GM's console.log only
DCC-QOL.SettingWeaponBackstab: Check if weapon can be used for backstabbing
DCC-QOL.SettingWeaponBackstabHint: Check weapon can be used for backstabbing if not UI warning diplay appears and prevent rolls
DCC-QOL.SettingWeaponRangeCheckHint: Applies penalty for ranged weapons based on range
DCC-QOL.TargetAToken: You must target a token before rolling the attack!
DCC-QOL.TargetOneToken: You must target only one token before rolling the attack!
DCC-QOL.libwrapperWarning: Module DCC-QOL requires the 'libWrapper' module. Please install and activate it.
DCC-QOL.WeaponMeleeWarn: Target is too far for a melee weapon!
DCC-QOL.WeaponRangedWarn: Target is too far for this ranged weapon!
DCC-QOL.WeaponWarningNonBackstabBonus: This weapon does not give you backstab bonus.
